title: Iro wo Kuu Akuma (The Color Eater)
synopsis: Anthology produced by Adobe Creative Cloud's Japan division to promote their software suite. It showcases the talents of various Japanese experimental animators.
staff: [['Yamakawa, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Animation Director']], ['Takagi, Masakatsu', ['Music']], ['Kubo, Yuutarou', ['Animation Director']], ['Arakawa, Junichi', ['Animation Director']]]
